title: Dialogue 1
raw:
この創業者が発明したコンデンサー型ヘッドホンだけは。。

「これだけは守りたい」と

イヤースピーカー一体のメーカーとして出直したんです
translated:
Being the founder of the electro-stat headphone driver..

"I want to protect at least this"

I will make a fresh start at being the integrated manufacturer of EAR SPEAKERS

title: Dialogue 3
translated:
I want to protect

**swap with prev bubble**

title: Dialogue 4
raw:
それだけコンデンサー型ヘッドホンに

自信と情熱を持っているということね
translated:
E-stat headphone drivers were all that

they had left to say that was their confidence and passion

title: Dialogue 6
raw: これは日本の技術屋魂の結晶です！！
translated: This is the crystallization / materialization of the soul / spirit of Japanese engineering!!
